name: Cancer Mutual
description: Digital products - such as the risk assessment tool, the self-check reminders and walkthroughs - are built to raise awareness and help people reduce exposure to cancer risk factors, reaching over a million South Africans each month.
one_liner: Digital products - such as the risk assessment tool, the self-check reminders and walkthroughs - are built to raise awareness and help people reduce exposure to cancer risk factors, reaching over a million South Africans each month.
